ModMetaData.name: Archonexus buildings provide power
ModMetaData.author: SubmissivePlusGreetable
ModMetaData.description:
A small patch that makes Archonexus buildings provide power. Tower - 3500 Major - 4000 Grand - 4500 Archonexus core - 6000
Mod was made via the request of some nice people from the Rimworld discord
